title: perspective
description: The `perspective` CSS property is used to give an element a 3D perspective view, defining how far the object is from the user.
content: The property that defines the distance between the viewer and the z=0 plane, affecting the depth of 3D transformed elements. It doesnâ€™t overwrite the `transform` property, as it adjusts the perspective without altering other transform functions. This property helps create realistic 3D effects by controlling the depth of elements.
